mapper.sql: select id, parent_id, name, url, code, type, sort, create_time, update_time, is_deleted from acl_permission
mapper.select: select distinct c.* from acl_admin_role a inner join acl_role_permission b on b.role_id = a.role_id inner join acl_permission c on c.id = b.permission_id where a.admin_id = #{adminId} and c.type = 1 and a.is_deleted = 0 and b.is_deleted = 0 and c.is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into acl_permission(id, parent_id, name, url, code, type, sort) values (#{id}, #{parentId}, #{name},#{url},#{code}, #{type}, #{sort})
mapper.update:
update acl_permission
parentId = #{parentId} ,
name = #{name} ,
url = #{url} ,
code = #{code} ,
type = #{type} ,
sort = #{sort}
where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0 order by id desc
